content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals.parquet/**',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') AS [result]
WHERE UOM = 'Parcels'
AND sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode = 'DBN'


    SELECT
EO_PostingMonth
,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
,SUM(
COALESCE(COST_Other,0) 
+ COALESCE(COST_Equipment,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_Fuel,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_Facilities,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_NonUnionisedLabour,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_UnionisedLabour,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_ServiceProvider,0)
+ COALESCE(COST_Linehaul,0)
) AS Cost

FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/DataLake Dev/CTS/Calculated_Tables/vw_CTS_Costs_2_TransactionsSummary_MapMonthTotals.parquet/**',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') AS [result]
    WHERE FixVarType IN ('Variable')
GROUP BY EO_PostingMonth
,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
